components.name: HorizontalCardList
components.description: A horizontal scrolling card list component for displaying items with images.

props.name: title
props.description: Header text displayed above the list

itemShape.id: required - Unique identifier for the item
itemShape.imageUrl: optional - URL for the item's image

props.name: onItemClick
props.description: Callback when an item is clicked, receives the item as argument

components.example: <HorizontalCardList title="Books" items={data.books.map(b => ({ id: b.id, imageUrl: b.cover, firstLineText: b.title, secondLineText: b.author }))} />
